name: Agilisium
tagline: Big on Cloud. Big on Data.
description:
Agilisium Consulting is a rapidly growing global IT consulting and solutions provider, based in Los Angeles. Founded in 2013, we are a niche cloud service provider with a 100% success rate in cloud migration and implementations. 
Our growth is marked both by a significant rise in employees (from 5 to 100) as well as an increase in revenue by more than 100%, within the short span of 2013 to 2016.
We are one of the few certified consulting partners of all three major cloud and data service providers: AWS, Google Cloud Platform and Microsoft Azure. We believe in delivering secure, flexible, and resilient cloud environments for responsive web development and ERP implementations.
Our mission is to deliver business agility through optimized, cost-effective cloud and data engineering services, with strong domain expertise across industries (healthcare, media & entertainment, electronics and consumer goods) and skilled technology innovation. Our next-gen managed services are designed to sharply align IT operations to business functions.
